synopsis.text: Takara, a young boy living in the year 2100, and Sara, a girl who has traveled through time from the present, embark on an action-packed adventure in a dystopian future ravaged by the devastating effects of global warming. As they navigate a world plagued by melting polar ice caps, scorching heat waves, and rising sea levels, Takara and Sara must learn to survive and overcome the challenges that lie ahead. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, the two children must work together to find their way in this harsh new world and uncover the truth about the environmental catastrophe that has befallen the planet. Will they be able to triumph over the obstacles in their path, or will they fall victim to the consequences of a world left to suffer from the neglect of its inhabitants? Only time will tell in this thrilling and thought-provoking family-oriented film.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
